description: Discover your next favorite song with Deezer! Deezer for Windows 8 brings over 20 million tracks (and counting!) to your fingertips with a sleek, fluid interface designed specifically for the modern era of Windows. Combining professional editorial curation with smart algorithms, Deezer ensures that your music is as unique as you are.
